CustomField.description: Grace period defaults to 30 days. This can be adjusted in the Households Settings tab.
CustomField.formula: if ( npo02__MembershipEndDate__c <today(), if (npo02__MembershipEndDate__c > ( TODAY() - IF(NOT(ISNULL($Setup.npo02__Households_Settings__c.npo02__Membership_Grace_Period__c)), $Setup.npo02__Households_Settings__c.npo02__Membership_Grace_Period__c, 30)) , "Grace Period" , "Expired") , if(isnull(npo02__MembershipEndDate__c ),"","Current"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula: Current, expired, or grace period. Default grace period set in Household Settings.
CustomField.label: Membership Status
